member.name: T:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions
member.summary: Represents the SignalR ConnectionOption object

member.name: P:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions.PingInterval
member.summary: PingInterval. (default: 300000)

member.name: P:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions.WaitForPageLoad
member.summary: If start is being called prior to page load and waitForPageLoad is true the call of start is re-direct to the window load event. (default: true)

member.name: P:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions.Jsonp
member.summary: If set to true, Jsonp will be used. (default: false)

member.name: P:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions.Transport
member.summary: allowed transport types.

member.name: P:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions.Callback
member.summary: A callback function to execute when the connection has started

member.name: T:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionState
member.summary: Represents a connection state of a SignalR connection.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionState.Connecting
member.summary: The connection state is connecting.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionState.Connected
member.summary: The connection state is connected.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionState.Reconnecting
member.summary: The connection state is reconnecting.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionState.Disconnected
member.summary: The connection state is disconnected.

member.name: T:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection
member.summary: A Connection for interacting with Hubs.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Logging
member.summary: client-side logging.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Id
member.summary: The connection id for the connection.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.MessageId
member.summary: The last message id for the connection.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.State
member.summary: The current ConnectionState of the connection.

member.name: F:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.QueryString
member.summary: data send to the server when the client connects.

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.CreateHubProxy(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new proxy object for the given hub connection that can be used to invoke methods on server hubs and handle client method invocation requests from the server.
member.param: The name of the hub on the server to create the proxy for.

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.IsCrossDomain(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if url is cross domain
member.param: The base URL
An optional argument to compare the URL against, if not specified it will be set to window.location. If specified it must contain a protocol and a host property.

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Start
member.summary: Starts the connection

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Start(Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions)
member.summary: Starts the connection
member.param: Options map

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Start(System.Action)
member.summary: Starts the connection
member.param: A callback function to execute when the connection has started

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Start(Bridge.SignalR.ConnectionOptions,System.Action)
member.summary: Starts the connection
member.param: Options map
A callback function to execute when the connection has started

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Stop
member.summary: Stops listening

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Stop(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stops listening
member.param: Whether or not to asynchronously abort the connection

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Stop(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stops listening
member.param: Whether or not to asynchronously abort the connection
Whether we want to notify the server that we are aborting the connection

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Starting(System.Action)
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked before anything is sent over the connection
member.param: A callback function to execute before the connection is fully instantiated.

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Sends data over the connection
member.param: The data to send over the connection

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Received(System.Action{System.Object})
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked after anything is received over the connection
member.param: A callback function to execute when any data is received on the connection

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.StateChanged(System.Action{Bridge.SignalR.StateChange})
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked when the connection state changes
member.param: A callback function to execute when the connection state changes

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Error(System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked after an error occurs with the connection
member.param: A callback function to execute when an error occurs on the connection

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Disconnected(System.Action)
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked when the client disconnects
member.param: A callback function to execute when the connection is broken

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.ConnectionSlow(System.Action)
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked when the client detects a slow connection
member.param: A callback function to execute when the connection is slow

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Reconnecting(System.Action)
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked when the underlying transport begins reconnecting
member.param: A callback function to execute when the connection enters a reconnecting state

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubConnection.Reconnected(System.Action)
member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked when the underlying transport reconnects
member.param: A callback function to execute when the connection is restored

member.name: T:Bridge.SignalR.HubProxy

member.summary: Name of the Hub

member.name: M:Bridge.SignalR.HubProxy.HasSubscriptions
member.summary: Checks for registered event on the Hub.
member.returns: Returns true if there is any registered event on the Hub.
